Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 23 minutes ago, The Minmus Derp said:
> 
> 
> I am immortal. I take away all your joint grease. You cannot move. I take the hill.
> 

I summon some more.

I succer punch you at lightspeed. My hill.
I can do that too ya know... My hill!
So begins a fight that is over in a blink of the eye. I win. My hill.
While *Fraston* and *The Minmus Derp* fight with each other in an isolated sandbox, the hill stays unpossessed.
I have a fight that lasts seconds as I throw the origin singularity at you. The huge blast of energy kills you and anyone within a 200 mile radius. I am 201 miles away. My hill.

Sandbox content restored after a crash caused by a singular event.

Hill is empty.
My hill.

Reset sandbox.

Still no hill owner.
You cannot do that. My hill. also you died in the origin singularity blast.

I embraced [@Fraston](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188565-fraston/)'s divine intentions.

[Now those ancient hills are ours.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/And_did_those_feet_in_ancient_time)
I join forces with [@Fraston](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188565-fraston/) and [@YNM](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/98447-ynm/). My hills too!

>enter sandbox /u:guest /p:\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*  

Hello! It's a hill sandbox. Please, enter a command.

>join hills  

Done. Hills are joined.

>list hill owners /hill:default  

Fraston  

The Minmus Derp  

YNM

>quit sandbox

\*\*\*

Now there is one hill with three owners at once.

Upd.  

Maybe not "joined" but "joint", but API has been written by not native speakers. So, that's by design.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-20T13:43:58Z" title="06/20/2018 01:43  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 20, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

I defend YNM and The minmus derp"s hill from any 'unbelievers' <sub>(while plotting an overthrow)</sub>

our hill.
I defeat your overthrow and shoot you into a black hole. Me and [@YNM](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/98447-ynm/)‘s hill.

i come out the other side, as it turns out to be a wormhole. i teleport across the universe to the hill and destroy it and make a new one.

my hill.
I remake the old one. Me and [@YNM](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/98447-ynm/)'s hill.

Duplicated claims ignored.

Borg comes to the hill. Hill is Borg.

two hills right next to each other with a half-god and a normal person and one with the god of death. do you even know how volatile that is?

I casually play 

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qKGsF31iZqs?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

out of an invisible speaker while i shoot down fire and brimstone from a portal to hell.

my hills.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-21T14:00:12Z" title="06/21/2018 02:00  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 21, 2018</time> by Fraston**
I find 300 other hills scattered across the solar system. My 300 hills.

You explode.

My 300 hills.
I cannot explode. My 300 Hills. Also I am impervious to any sort of attack.
oh yea i blow kerbin's core to bits and destroy everything
The Big Crunch happens, killing you, followed by another Big Bang. I create a new hill in the new universe. My hill.
I take the hill. My hill.
The hill is heavy. It crushes you.
